p
Class Bubble

java.lang.Object
  p.MovingObject
      p.Bubble

 class Bubble
extends MovingObject

Class representing a bubble in the water.
The bubbles are simply light circles.

Author:
Andras Belicza

Method Detail

getX

public int getX()
Returns the x coordiante of the bubble as an integer.
Overrides MovingObject.getX() because we want a little horizontal oscillation.

Overrides:
getX in class MovingObject
Returns:
x coordiante of the bubble as an integer

makeStep

public void makeStep()
Makes this bubble to step one.
Overrides MovingObject.makeStep() because we have other things to do, we have to step the oscillation phase too. Stepping means increasing position with the velocity.

Overrides:
makeStep in class MovingObject
